name: Niezależny Samorządny Związek Zawodowy "Solidarność"
goal: defending workers' dignity, interests and rights, representation of workers vis a vis employers, local administration and state authorities, expressing opinions and preparing initiatives on legal regulations concerning any aspects of working life, participation in international organizations
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: European Semester, social policy legislation, Social Pillar of Rights, reconciliation of professional and family life, revision of Posted Workers' Directive
